section.title: Installation
section.screen:
pkg_add -r mysql56-server pkg_add -r mysql56-client
/usr/local/etc/rc.d/mysql-server onestart /usr/local/bin/mysqladmin -u root password 'newpassword'
cat >> /etc/rc.conf <<EOF mysql_enable="YES" EOF
section.para: To install using the ports system:
section.screen:
cd /usr/ports/databases/mysql56-server/ make install clean
cd /usr/ports/databases/mysql56-client/ make install clean
